roleset.name: crash, slam or invade, possibly unexpectedly
roleset.note: BUMRUSH-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls. (from bumrush.01-v)

example.name: both args
example.text: Then Will Williams and Allen Ruff decided that free speech is n't really free and stood in front of my camera and then bum rushed me along with bald Tom Cruise . Pretty lame .
